channel.title: Visualisation on Advanced Analytics for Web
channel.description: Recent content in Visualisation on Advanced Analytics for Web

item.title: Setup
item.description: There are a number of options to visualise your modelled data. We will explore a few ideas to get started. Download the streamlit-visualisation project template and copy the unzipped folder to your project directory to get started. Attachments streamlit-visualisation.zip (28 KB) Step 1: Install Requirements Run the command below to install the project requirements and run the virtual environment pipenv install pipenv shell Step 2: Setup Database Connection Open secrets.toml and add your Snowflake account and database details.
